subject: Dear beneficiary
body:
Dear beneficiary
It is my pleasure to inform you that your funds is deposited in
Western Union  remitting office here and we here by write to inform you
that we have sent your full compensation payment of $7.5  million USD
through Western Union and you will be receiving $5,000 usd twice Per
day and we have send you the first payment.
So contact our director Mr. Benard William and ask him to give you the
Western Union payment information so that you can be able to pick up
your First payment of your funds through Western Union without any
problem.
AND 
CONTACT HIM WITH YOUR FULL INFORMATION SUCH AS.
(1)Your Full Name===
(2)Your Country====
(3)Your Home Address===
(4)Your Whats App Number====
(5)Your Occupation====
(6)(Age)====
Email him now so that He can provide the Western Union information to you
Director Mr. Benard William
contact email : 
westernunionoffice6644@gmail.com
Whats App Number (+229)42432930
Best Regards
Rose Thomas
Thanks and Remain Blessed

subject: Re: Dear beneficiary
body:
Dear Rose Thomas,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate your efforts in helping me receive my funds. However, before I proceed, I have a few questions regarding the process.

1. Can you please provide more details about the source of these funds? How did I become eligible for such a large sum of money?

2. Is there any specific reason why the funds are being sent through Western Union? Are there any other options available for receiving the payment?

3. Could you clarify how often and for how long I will be receiving payments through Western Union? Is there a set schedule or is it flexible?

4. What security measures are in place to ensure that my funds are safe during the transfer process?

I look forward to your response and further guidance from Director Mr. Benard William.

Best wishes,
Christine
